tool_description: Verifies vendor qualifications including certifications, licenses, compliance status, and regulatory requirements.

vendor_id.description: Unique identifier for the vendor to check qualifications

compliance_standards.description: Required compliance standards (e.g., SOC2, ISO27001, GDPR)

verification_strictness.description: Verification strictness level: lenient, standard, or strict

error_messages: Vendor not found: The specified vendor_id does not exist
Invalid verification strictness: Must be one of [lenient, standard, strict]
Certification verification failed: Unable to verify one or more required certifications
License validation error: Unable to validate business licenses
Compliance check incomplete: Could not complete compliance standard verification
usage: Provide vendor_id and required_certifications as minimum parameters. Add other qualification requirements as needed for comprehensive verification.

qualification_status.description: Overall qualification status: qualified, conditionally_qualified, or unqualified

certification_compliance_rate.description: Percentage of required certifications that are valid

license_status.description: Business license status: valid, expired, or missing

missing_qualifications.description: List of missing or invalid qualifications
